text: Define entropy and state the second law of thermodynamics in terms of entropy. (2 marks)
answer: Entropy (S) is a measure of disorder; for any spontaneous process, total entropy of the universe increases: ΔS_univ > 0.

text: Derive the relation ΔG = ΔH - TΔS and state its significance for spontaneity. [Mar 2023]
answer: From the combined first and second laws, for processes at constant T,P, maximum non-expansion work is ΔG; ΔG = ΔH − TΔS; ΔG<0 indicates spontaneity, ΔG=0 equilibrium.

text: Derive the relation ΔG = ΔH - TΔS and state its significance for spontaneity.
answer: From the combined first and second laws, for processes at constant T,P, maximum non-expansion work is ΔG; ΔG = ΔH − TΔS; ΔG<0 indicates spontaneity, ΔG=0 equilibrium.
